      Parameters:
      lobbies - list of all lobbies present on the server
      lobbyNumber - number of the selected lobby
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is valid and exists, false otherwise

      public void getWorkerPlacement​(int[][] workers, char initial)
      Lets the user place the workers, showing them only the unoccupied tiles on the board. Updates obsevers with an Answer message containing the position of the worker.
      Specified by:
      getWorkerPlacement in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      workers - matrix with the positions of all the already placed workers
      initial - player's initial

    • getSelectedWorker

      public void getSelectedWorker​(OptionSelection opt, boolean canPass)
      Called at the beginning of the selection phase, it calls other methods that asks the player to make a selection to complete the turn step
      Specified by:
      getSelectedWorker in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      opt - list of all possible selections
      canPass - true if the turn step can be passed, false if it can't

    • getWorkerSelectionOneOption

      public void getWorkerSelectionOneOption​(OptionSelection opt, boolean canPass)
      Asks the player to select a worker and choose the power "destination". Gets called when there's only one selectable worker.
      Parameters:
      opt - all the possible power destination options and the worker's position
      canPass - true if the turn step can be passed, false if it can't

    • getWorkerSelection

      public void getWorkerSelection​(OptionSelection opt, boolean canPass)
      Asks the player to select a worker and choose the power "destination". Gets called when there are two selectable workers.
      Specified by:
      getWorkerSelection in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      opt - all the possible power destination options and the worker's position
      canPass - true if the turn step can be passed, false if it can't
